discovery_questions.question: Do you enjoy movies from the 90s era?

recommendations.title: Schindler's List
recommendations.description_brief: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

recommendations.title: Titanic
recommendations.description_brief: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious but ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

recommendations.title: Goodfellas
recommendations.description_brief: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

recommendations.title: The Shawshank Redemption
recommendations.description_brief: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

recommendations.title: Forrest Gump
recommendations.description_brief: The history of the US from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns for a single goal throughout his life.

recommendations.title: The Matrix
recommendations.description_brief: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

recommendations.title: Fight Club
recommendations.description_brief: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.

recommendations.title: Pulp Fiction
recommendations.description_brief: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and others intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
